title: Jurassic Park / Congo
description: Two breathtaking adventure novels in one bumper volume.  Jurassic ParkOn a remote jungle island genetic engineers have created a dinosaur game park. Then a rival firm tries to steal embryos, and the nightmare begins.  Congo Three intrepid adventurers plunge into the heart of Africa in a desperate bid for the fabulous diamonds of the Lost City of Zinj.
author: Michael Crichton
